mapper.select: INSERT INTO notification (content, checked, username, link, title) VALUES(#{content}, 0, #{username}, #{link}, #{title})
SELECT id, content, checked, username, link, title FROM notification WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 20
SELECT id, content, checked, username, link, title FROM notification WHERE username = #{username} AND checked = 0
SELECT id, content, checked, username, link, title FROM notification WHERE username = #{username} AND checked = 1
